Question: Realman Intelligent Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
RealMan Intelligent Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd.

Product: RM65 Series

- 6-DOF Ultra-lightweight Humanoid Robotic Arm
- Three models: RM65-B (basic version), RM65-ZF (1-axis-force version), RM65-6F (6-axis-force version)
- Ultra-high load-to-self-weight ratio, flexible deployment, ultra-low power, integrated controller, ultra-high compatibility, open system, safe and sensitive, wireless and convenient connection, integrated modularization
- Applications: reinforcement binding robot, suction cup loading and unloading, coffee robot
- Application scenarios: 3C industry, educational research, construction industry, industrial production

Contact: Alex
Phone: +86-18640486517
Email: alex@realman-robot.com
Summary_cn:
RealMan Intelligent Technology (北京) 有限公司。

产品：RM65系列

- 6自由度超轻型人型机械臂
- 三种型号：RM65-B（基础版），RM65-ZF（1轴力版），RM65-6F（6轴力版）
- 超高载荷自重比，灵活部署，超低功耗，集成控制器，超高兼容性，开放式系统，安全敏感，无线便捷连接，集成模块化
- 应用：加强绑定机器人，吸盘装卸，咖啡机器人
- 应用场景：3C行业，教育研究，建筑行业，工业生产
